name: Wizard House
description:
A small point-and-click game for the 'Jam, Baby, Jam!' 2021 game jam. I chose the theme "This part’s not gonna be used" from the suggested themes. My idea was to make game where none of the items and objects have any use and the puzzles have no actual solutions. The game ended up having less content than I had planned, so I expect it will feel somewhat unfinished.

There is nothing useful in the wizard's house. You cannot solve any puzzles or find any rewards. Decide for yourself when to quit. You can be sure you've visited every room if you've found all 7 gnomes.

Controls

* Mouse to look around, left mouse button to interact
* Press 'Escape' to quit.
